name: Cinderella
text:
Dressed up, as if by magic,
scorched by the heat, we shared a dance together.

name: Cinderella
text:
My first and last partner, my destined dance partner.
There was a time when I believed in that.

name: Cinderella
text:
Even after we fell in love each other, and were
united in 'happily ever after', my time would still continue on.

name: Cinderella
text:
Even if my dance partners, and everyone else,
leave the party's dance hall one after another.

name: Cinderella
text:
The passage of time is different for each and everyone.
The distance we live, the place we live, are surely different from each other's.

name: Cinderella
text:
I've lived a little longer than the others,
so I thought I knew a little about the logic of this world.

name: Cinderella
text:
But, aside from helping others, I didn't know
how to spend this long time I had compared to others.

name: Cinderella
text:
That's right...
'A phoenix is not the one to be saved'.
Maybe— I was convinced of such a thing?

'Cinderella', that's what they called her in this Tokyo.
She thought it was just another name that had been added to her collection.

She became an instructor at the Firefighting University because
she was asked to, after rescuing a child from a fire.

Dancing out of the fire, to be worshipped on the spot, and disappear once
again into the fire— She thought the usual cycle had begun.

It was some time after that that she realized that the name 'Cinderella'
might be a little different from her past ones.

She learned that its meaning was neither 'firebird'
nor 'symbol of immortality and prosperity'.

The moment she realized that, her heart—
felt as if it had flown from its pedestal into the sky.

—She realized that she had wanted to fly.
Together, covered in ashes, jumping over fire, with someone by her side.

name: Gurangatch
text:
Alright, everyone who's ready,
please line up at the climbing rope~

Even during the high school's vacation,
the fire brigade's regular training is as usual.

As a quota, everyone except for those in administration and public relations
begins the training to climb a rope using only their arm strength.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I...
What if [Player] overtakes me before I can even beat Sandra...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you being so timid for!?
Show some guts, Reddy!!

options.text: I can't lose to a one-handed Cinderella.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I...
What if [Player] overtakes me before I can even beat Sandra...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you being so timid for!?
Show some guts, Reddy!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To have [Player] take a picture of me losing to Sandra...
It's just like public punishment!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you being so timid for!?
Show some guts, Reddy!!

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Hey, hey, are you saying we're not even in your sights?
Don't you know how sad that is~?

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
But my junior isn't going to lose either, alright?
Didn't you know that while you were at T.S.L., we were training hard?

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Baatar-senpai, you were just watching!?
Anyway, I'm going to show [Player] what I'm made of.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
You should have played along, Akiha-chan!
Has your skill in ignoring me improved too!?

name: Gurangatch
text:
Um, can we start soon?
Everyone else is waiting...

options.text: I'll show you the power of a big rookie.

name: Gurangatch
text:
Alright, here we go~
On your mark, three, two, one—

name: Red Hood
text:
A little more, just a little more!
This time, I beat my personal best, but still...

name: Gurangatch
text:
Reddy, you've been secretly training
hard with Commissioner Raven, haven't you~?

name: Cinderella
text:
With that old geezer?
I sure hope you didn't pick up any bad habits.

name: Cinderella
text:
But during that time, you'd both know that
I was also focused in training, right, Gurangatch, Reddy?

name: Cinderella
text:
Or did you think that just because I'm old,
I wouldn't update my personal best?

name: Red Hood
text:
Uuuuugh—!
[Player], practice with me in secret!!

name: Cinderella
text:
Hmph, keep at it.
The rescue technique competition is coming up soon.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh, right, it's your first time, [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: As the name suggests, fire brigades from each district and students from the Tokyo Firefighting University compete in their respective rescue techniques.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There's a land division, a water division, and even a public relations poster contest!
I wonder how many records we can break this time.

options.text: So there's a competition like that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh, right, it's your first time, [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: As the name suggests, fire brigades from each district and students from the Tokyo Firefighting University compete in their respective rescue techniques.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There's a land division, a water division, and even a public relations poster contest!
I wonder how many records we can break this time.

options.text: I'll be your secret training partner anytime.

name: Red Hood
text:
That Fire Commissioner Raven will also be participating,
so we all have to get fired up!

name: Red Hood
text:
But we can't rely on Sandra either. During the competition, she'll be participating as an
individual athlete from the university, rather than being a part of the fire brigade.

name: Cinderella
text:
...About that, I was thinking of
participating as a team this time.

name: Red Hood
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Eh...!?

name: Red Hood
text:
R-Really!?
Even though you've always held the record by yourself!?

name: Cinderella
text:
No one ever asked me to join the fire brigade team.
However—

Cinderella closes her eyes as she speaks.
The events at T.S.L. floated in her mind.

name: Cinderella
text:
No one asked me.
No one invited me for a dance.

name: Cinderella
text:
But then, it occurred to me. Maybe, I had gotten used to
people holding out their hands to me.

name: Cinderella
text:
The 'ash-covered' ones would jump into the fire
of their own accord, without anyone telling them to do so.

name: Cinderella
text:
I had no memory of being rescued from a fire.
There are still many things I don't know in this world.

name: Cinderella
text:
But... I don't like being beaten
and surprised all the time.

name: Cinderella
text:
Next time, it's my turn to surprise you.
I'll show you that I'm not old for nothing.

name: Cinderella
text:
So this time, I'll be participating
in the team competition with you.

name: Cinderella
text:
I've been dying to settle the score with that old geezer
on the same level, you know?

name: Red Hood
text:
Yay!! We did it, [Player]!!
Then, what event would the three of us be able to participate in—

options.text: The strongest member is on our side!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, if you think I'm just a musclehead, you're mistaken.
Let's wreak havoc in the awareness poster and awareness video categories too!!

name: Cinderella
text:
That's why, I'd like us to actively
do unit training from now on.

name: Cinderella
text:
After this today, we'll immediately
have team training outdoors—

name: Red Hood
text:
...Was that thunder just now?
Come to think of it, my fur has been feeling a little damp...

options.text: The weather was fine until just now...
It's a common thing this season.
So is the outdoor training cancelled?

text:
A few minutes after the first thunder was heard.
Before they knew it, the sky was covered in dark clouds, and a heavy thunderstorm began.

Although just rain would not cancel training,
it's a different story when it's accompanied by thunder.
The training became basic training indoors.

Since Cinderella said she had some preparations to make,
the group started training first.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Ah~ A rain of blessings. The traditions of summer.
I'm grateful that the hot sun is gone~

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
That's right, so please do
your physical training properly, senior.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
If I do physical training, I'll get hot.
Resting your body is also an important, important training—

name: Red Hood
text:
The lazy 'hooded one' will
be eaten by the wolf!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akiha Gongen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Red Hood-senpai, go ahead and take a big bite out of Baatar-senpai!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ulaanbaatar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's soooo mean!
Where is the hero who will save me!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akiha Gongen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Red Hood-senpai, go ahead and take a big bite out of Baatar-senpai!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ulaanbaatar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's soooo mean!
Where is the hero who will save me!?

options.text: And so begins the story of the two of them...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ulaanbaatar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, Reddy, you feel that way about me...
I'm sorry for never having noticed until now...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No, what are you talking about!?
I don't know that story!!

name: Gurangatch
text:
Hey, if you mess around too much,
you'll get scolded by Captain Cinderella again.

That's right.
It's always like this when you show up, isn't it?

name: Red Hood
text:
S-S-Sandra!? What's with the sudden
change of clothes, you're not in your uniform...
Sandra, in casual clothes? Eh, why?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: As expected of [Player], I was hoping you'd understand.

name: Cinderella
text:
I had someone pick them out for me.
After all, there are times when just a uniform is inconvenient, right?

name: Cinderella
text:
Now! You all wipe your sweat, change, and get ready.
The 'carriage' summoned by the witch will be here soon.

name: Cinderella
text:
That old geezer Raven will probably make a face, but who cares?
I've already coordinated with the other branch offices—

name: Red Hood
text:
C-could it be, Sandra,
you're taking all of us... Ah, a lot of cars are coming!

name: Gurangatch
text:
A limousine taxi...!?
And the emblem of a famous venture company in Roppongi... Whoa!!

name: Ifrit
text:
Our apologies to have kept you waiting!! Fire brigade party,
we've come to pick you up and guide you to T.S.L.!

name: Cinderella
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">—Get in.

name: Everyone
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Old hag—!!

note: just like that one scene of Amethyst from Steven Universe

text: Epilogue

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Yahoo—!!
To think I'd get a vacation on Sandra's treat, it was worth coming to work!

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Wow! Is this really underground!?
With this, we can play as much as we want, no matter how stormy it is outside!

name: Gurangatch
text:
The river and the sea, the reproduction is amazing!
It's been a while since I've swum in a place like this.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well then, everyone,
don't get too carried away. Dismissed!

name: Red Hood
text:
...I still can't believe it.
Did Oscar-san's measure to get repeating visits actually work?

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, I don't really know about that?
I just came because I simply wanted to come.

name: Cinderella
text:
Now, [Player], Reddy.
Let's fulfill our promise right away.

name: Cinderella
text:
—Let's get going right away.
They're all already there.

options.text: You got a stylish swimsuit out of nowhere!?

name: Cinderella
text:
What's wrong? If you're just going
to stand there daydreaming, I'll leave you on your own?

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm coming, I'm coming!?
I'll at least win in the water play!

Leading her juniors,
Cinderella walks gracefully through the park.

She stops at unfamiliar plants,
and with a limited-time drink in hand, she reaches her destination.

Of her own will, not at anyone's request,
with pride, with all her might—

name: Cinderella
text:
—I understand Baatar's feelings a little.
I guess this is what it means to feel light in both body and mind.

name: Cinderella
text:
You all separated me from the 'will to respond to requests'—
and made me the 'Cinderella' who 'desires for herself', I suppose?

name: Red Hood
text:
Sandra...
I'm a little surprised, but—

name: Red Hood
text:
Grandma! Today, Little Red Riding Hood and I were able to gather
a lot of raspberries. We're going to make the cake you taught us.

name: Red Hood
text:
The hunter also just came back with a big catch, so tonight's going to be a feast.
I'll cook it so it's easy for you to eat too, Grandma.

name: Red Hood
text:
Please eat a lot and get well! And then, let's all go out again.
Let's play somewhere far from the town, just us—

name: Red Hood
text:
—It's nothing! But, I do really love the
current Sandra, who's just like a free bird!

options.text: Your passion has been polished, hasn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What's that supposed to mean?
...Ah, look, they're waiting for us.

options.text: It's like you could fly around forever.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What's that supposed to mean?
...Ah, look, they're waiting for us.

options.text: You were wonderful from the moment we met.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're quite a smooth talker, [Player].
My heart skipped a beat... just a little?

name: Shennong
text:
Hey, you're finally here. Honestly, doctors aren't free either,
so don't think you can just call me whenever you want, alright?

name: Hogen
text:
But you were the first one to arrive at the meeting place,
weren't you? Or was I mistaken? Hahaha.

name: Shennong
text:
That does make me wonder, weren't you the one who came first and
was looking for a chance to check my belongings from the shadows?

name: Hogen
text:
Guh, you saw me hidden in the shadow of the aurora?
This time, I've learned that it's not good to rely too much on my divine eye!

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], missed.
Cinderella, Red Hood too. Let's go, can't wait, any longer!

name: Yuma
text:
...Right, Oscar. Oscar,
on slider? Alright, woof?

name: Oscar
text:
...Hahaha, of course.
As you know, I'm all about being prepared, so I've come prepared. Yes!

options.text: I'll show you the true strength of our fire brigade!
Is there a prize for winning?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That would certainly be interesting.
...But if everyone is sliding, can it even be judged?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't worry about that!
I've installed a ranking camera on the competition lane!!

options.text: I won't go easy on you, even if you're Cinderella.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hah, alright. To my cheeky junior, I'll show you the pride of a senior. Right, Reddy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-Hey, of course, I won't lose either!
But [Player]'s really amazing, so I wonder if I'll be alright...

name: Cinderella
text:
Then, will you follow me? I've been looking forward to this...
The moment we could all gather and mess around, until we turn to ashes.

name: Red Hood
text:
I was just thinking I wanted to come again!
I'm used to being pushed around, so I'll go with you anywhere!

name: Cinderella
text:
Wha...!
Reddy, you'd better be prepared later!!

In the theme park that imitates a tropical country,
they fly around and enjoy playing in the water.

The woman once called a phoenix is not there.
The 'ash-covered' who waited for the magic on her own— is no longer there either.

name: Cinderella
text:
—Ah, I got the seats. I've decided what I want to eat.
I'll send you the dish names, so please order for me, [Player].

name: Cinderella
text:
Phew, I'm still not used to it. To think the day would come when
I'd tell someone else my wishes and have them carry those out for me.

name: Cinderella
text:
But no matter what part of myself I'd show them,
the ash-covered ones would accept me all the same.
There's nothing that could make me happier.

Ah, um, my lady.
I apologize if I am mistaken, but—

name: Horus
text:
N-No, you are indeed Bennu-sama...!
To think I would be able to meet you in such a place!

name: Horus
text:
Even though you had transferred to this Tokyo,
I apologize for my late greetings, and for it being in this manner—

name: Cinderella
text:
...I don't know that name. Are you sure you're not mistaken?
Strangely enough, I'm often mistaken for someone else.

name: Horus
text:
—I see. Please forgive my rudeness, my lady in disguise.
My name is Horus. May I ask for your name in this life?

While smiling at the 'as usual, understanding young master',
she repeats in her heart the name that the person she once
rescued gave her, and the name that her friends acknowledged.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm here on my day off,
a humble 'ash-covered' from the Tokyo Firefighting University.

name: Cinderella
text:
You can call me...
"Cinderella"—

Tropical Burn Holiday
~Move Out! Tropical Fire Brigade~
-END-
